title: The Martyr's Brother
description: A martyr’s duty is to die. And kill.Five years ago, a suicide-bomber named Nadheer detonated an explosive-filled Toyota outside a Middle East military checkpoint. The blast shattered more than those immediately around him—it forever changed two more lives. Shafra, his brother, who worshipped Nadheer and now longs to follow in his footsteps and Alicia Blake, whose husband’s violent end in the same terrorist attack haunts her and threatens to overcome her overactive imagination. Now Shafra has arrived in America, and he has his sights set on Atlanta. Time is ticking down and Alicia holds the key to stopping him before he rips the world apart.
author: Rona Simmons
